eval_variables.static_spells: ability = selected_features['gnome_spellcasting']; static_spells.merge({ 'minor_illusion' => { 'attack_bonus' => proficiency_bonus + modifiers[ability], 'save_dc' => 8 + proficiency_bonus + modifiers[ability] } })

ability = selected_features['gnome_spellcasting']; static_spells.merge({ 'speak_with_animals' => { 'limit' => proficiency_bonus, 'attack_bonus' => proficiency_bonus + modifiers[ability], 'save_dc' => 8 + proficiency_bonus + modifiers[ability] } })

ability = selected_features['gnome_spellcasting']; static_spells.merge({ 'mending' => { 'attack_bonus' => proficiency_bonus + modifiers[ability], 'save_dc' => 8 + proficiency_bonus + modifiers[ability] }, 'prestidigitation' => { 'attack_bonus' => proficiency_bonus + modifiers[ability], 'save_dc' => 8 + proficiency_bonus + modifiers[ability] } })
